The video showing the banner hanging fro: PaulLidicul in response to President Trump's decision regarding the Kurdish forces in Syria.
PaulLidicul: who created the fake video, also previously made a digitally altered video showing a banner reading "Concentration Camps" hanging from Trump Tower.
The claim made in the banner: stating that President Trump "betrayed and murdered Kurdish people," was not physically present on Trump Tower.
The decision of President Trump to withd: S. forces from northern Syria and not aid American-allied Kurdish forces was widely criticized by politicians from both Republican and Democratic parties.
